frontmatter.title: Writing a new Extractor for PHPoAuthUserData

posts.excerpt: I recently wrote a new  PHP library  to simplify the extraction of user data ( name ,  email ,  id , etc…) from various OAuth providers such as  Facebook ,  Twitter  and  Linkedin . Is well know that OAuth 1 and 2 are great  standard  protocols to authenticate users in our apps. Anyway we often need to go further the authentication process and extract various information about the authenticated users.
